function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of interdisciplinary approach between technical and health backgrounds","Impact":"Inability to address public health issues related to the built environment, leading to increased risk of disease propagation","Mitigation":"Promote collaboration and knowledge sharing between technical and health professionals, establish interdisciplinary working groups","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, communication tools, knowledge sharing platforms","People":"Researchers, practitioners, public health experts, technical professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness among stakeholders of factors affecting health in living spaces","Impact":"Poor living conditions leading to compromised health and well-being of occupants","Mitigation":"Educate stakeholders about health-related factors in living spaces, provide information and guidelines for designing healthy living environments","Technologies":"Educational materials, awareness campaigns, guidelines for healthy building design","People":"Citizens, policymakers, building code legislators, tax incentive providers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Little shared vocabulary among disciplines","Impact":"Barriers to effective communication and collaboration between different disciplines, hindering efforts to address public health issues in the built environment","Mitigation":"Develop a shared vocabulary, facilitate communication and knowledge exchange between disciplines","Technologies":"Communication tools, interdisciplinary training programs, knowledge exchange platforms","People":"Researchers, practitioners, public health experts, technical professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions, industry organizations"}]}
